website_summaries.verdict: Minor issues aside, this RC car has amazing qualities for the price – sporty looks, fast action, and responsive remote. You won't find one with more to offer for a lower price.
pros: This handsome sports car has sharp details similar to a real Lamborghini, and is capable of speeds up to 10 mph
Kids love the working lights, horn, and doors
cons: A few reports of faulty cars that stopped going forwards or backwards, or had misaligned gears or wheels that quit rotating

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars--updated!!
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it but the front wheel broke off within an hour of using it. Very disappointing! Update: The seller reached out and provided a replacement, with good communication along the way. The new one seems to be holding up better. Thank you for the good customer service!
customer_reviews.author: CCGG

customer_reviews.title: A great little car plus excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: My five-year old saved and saved to be able to purchase his own remote-controlled car. This one seemed to be the best quality for the lowest price and he's thrilled with it. It's fairly small but goes fast and he loves it. When my husband accidentally drove over the remote controller and broke it my son was devastated. The seller quickly sent us a replacement at no cost from China! Excellent customer service on top of a great product made this a win-win for us.
customer_reviews.author: Boethe

customer_reviews.title: REALLY REALLY FAST FROM 0 to zero! DOA
customer_reviews.text: I have played with many Remote controlled cars and when I saw this “fast” car for relatively low price, I had to get it for my kids. Well I just got it and it’s REALLY REALLY FAST to being a dead unusable toy. I never seen any car which goes from 0 to 0 in 0 secs like this car. At least lights and steering works like expected...now if it actually went forward and backward, it would be an awesome toy. Definitely returning this thing and never buying from them again.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: My 5-year-old loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: My five-year-old saw it and wanted it! He absolutely loves it! He plays with it every day. It's actually his favorite toy now. Yup, Paw Patrol and PJ Masks, I think they have some competition now. This car is easy for him to maneuver and the batteries seem to last a while. Can't beat the price for this kinda quality. My son has already crashed it, well ALOT!! It's still going!
customer_reviews.author: H.S. Dunlap

customer_reviews.title: I purchased 3 of these! 3!!! ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 3 of these! 3!!! for my boys for christmas. This morning they opened them and not one works! There were alot of tears! I am so disapointed. I am requesting a refund ASAP so my boys can get another gift since these did not work!
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Seller tried to get higher rating with PayPal refund!
customer_reviews.text: Updated: Seller reached out to try to get me to refund through PayPal in return for an updated higher rating which turns out is against Amazon policy and could get me banned from Amazon! Looks great, but didn't last. My son was so excited to get this, but all it took was running it into the wall on accident once for it to break. After this happened, the wheels would not run.
customer_reviews.author: DB*85*

customer_reviews.title: Fun but mediocre
customer_reviews.text: Works best on low carpets. The tires are too slick, causing it to be impossible to drive on tile, hardwood, etc. Batteries die pretty quickly, like about 1.5 hours and it starts getting really noticeable. Lights only turn on when you are accelerating or reversing, would be cool if they stayed on when the car is on. Pretty good handling though overall, and it does look really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Photonicus

customer_reviews.title: Looks good,  poor drivetrain. (UPDATED: Customer Service)
customer_reviews.text: It looked great out of the box. The issue is the build quality. The motor housing failed and the drivetrain quit. This all happened on day 2. ****UPDATE**** I was contacted by Customer Service in reference to my review as they seem caring about their customers. I was rather surprised by this and in a good way. They have taken the proper steps to make things right and I applaud their commitment to good customer relations. Because of their efforts I have upgraded my review from 2 Stars to 4 Stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wiley

customer_reviews.title: Cool car but doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: I received one of these cars, and my son played with it for a few (3 ish) hours. He didn't abuse it, didn't crash it, etc. And after a few hours the motor would turn, but the wheels didn't. Apparently a gear was stripped or had slipped. I returned the car for exchange and got a new one. The same thing happened after only an hour or so. The car is very nice, has head lights and backup lights, is pretty fast, but it has a design flaw in the drive gears that needs to be fixed. It's too bad, my son loved that car!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Hansel

customer_reviews.title: Works well on carpet by my surprise.
customer_reviews.text: My 9yr old son loved the car. He really dug how the headlights lit up in both forward / reverse. Does seem to work pretty well on about an 1" thick of carpet. Moves faster on smoother surfaces though. 5x total AA batteries needed.
customer_reviews.author: LoveAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working. I bought it in August, but for my sons birthday in September. We just started using it this passed weekend and it was fine, now all of a sudden it’s powered but wheels won’t go when on the ground. When I hold it in the air the wheels go. Very aggravated as I have a sad 8 year old on my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Jenelle Buczko

customer_reviews.title: Wheels stopped spinning after 10 min
customer_reviews.text: My son was so excited about this gift but the wheels stopped spinning after about 10 minutes of play, my son thought his Christmas was ruined! Luckily my husband is very handy and he was able to take it apart and get the wheels spinning again. Still we have to be very careful and I'm afraid it won't last long at all! Looks cool and the headlights working is cool at least.
customer_reviews.author: April B

customer_reviews.title: Great for indoor racing.
customer_reviews.text: The RC car is fun to drive and a perfect size to race around the house. Really quick and easy to set up. It only takes 5AA batteries and then you are off to the races. It’s fast and you are able to control it nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price, however do not expect to be able to play with other RC cars unless you can change the frequency on them, because you can't on these. The remote controls all of these in range as well as other brands/models. One remote controlled the two of these we bought and my toddler's all at once! Still a fun toy and worth the $17
customer_reviews.author: sam luurtsema

customer_reviews.title: Sleek looking remote controlled car.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cool remote controlled car. I got this for my nephew whose 5 and he was so blown away by it. The headlights even work which was a nice touch. The Downsides to this are: it doesn’t come with batteries, the remote isn’t as stylish and is very basic, the battery door compartment is tricky to open and require tools.
customer_reviews.author: cmguido

customer_reviews.title: Speedy, fun car for any RC roadster
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car as a gift, and the recipient has enjoyed playing with it quite a bit. I find the car to drive quite fast compared to some others on the market, and you can't beat the price. The build quality is good, and has stood up to many hours of playtime.
customer_reviews.author: John Parker

customer_reviews.title: No way to change frequency
customer_reviews.text: Works just fine, but I ordered 2 for my children so they could play together as a gift from their new baby brother and they sent the same frequency so they are essentially useless at this point because they argue with each other because they control each others and there is not a way to change it. They can't play at the same time so they have. Even tossed aside
customer_reviews.author: Hillary K

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the tears of my little one!
customer_reviews.text: Broke on the second day of my son playing with it, total play time - 2 hours... huge disappointment and a lot of tears after toy broke.
customer_reviews.author: YK-NJ

customer_reviews.title: WHAT A DISSAPOINTMENT
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 year old for his birthday. He had picked it out and begged me to buy it. Did not work, only the lights and wheels turn. I tried 2 sets of new batteries just to make sure. I even tried rechargeable batteries (fully charged). Still did not work. cost me more just for the batteries, chargers etc. Terrible product. Should of read the earlier reviews before buying.
customer_reviews.author: JP71

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these cars and unfortunately, though I liked them, they didn’t last 30 minutes being operated by my 4yr old. The cars sound like the drive gears wore out as the motors have power but the cars wouldn’t move. The remotes operate on the same frequency and one remote would operate both cars.
customer_reviews.author: Motty

customer_reviews.title: a little cheap
customer_reviews.text: the car broke after just a few uses. It is made of a pretty cheap material. it looks super good and was a fun present for a 10 year old. my only complaint was that it broke so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jojomedic

customer_reviews.title: Not worthy
customer_reviews.text: It is not worth for this price.It is very small and did not like the look of this RC car. Even it is not running smooth on carpets, I found the motor is good but it is a delicate piece so I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: keerthi

customer_reviews.title: Good item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice bright little car. It really goes quik on the flat floor. It doesn't really move on carpets. I like the way the lights go on when going forward or backward.
customer_reviews.author: Sonia

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied customer!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product was defective. Returned to seller in exchange for new replacement which I never received. Very unhappy with product and service. Nothing about this order has been satisfactory!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Stuller

customer_reviews.title: This car does not honk and doors don't open.
customer_reviews.text: This car should be five dollars.... I've seen better quality rc at Five Below. The "most helpful review" listed says this car honks and doors open... This is not true. My son was very disappointed it didn't do those 2 things. The antenna was broken in the box. Definitely sending this piece of junk back.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Wangard has been exceptional in resolving my issue concerning the Lamborghini remote control car I bought my son for Christmas. While I had an issue with the product, they were quick to remedy the situation and are sending me a replacement car at no cost. My son loves this toy and it was his favorite gift on Christmas. He was sad when the wheels stopped gripping on the tile, but is now excited to get a new one that we hope will work as promised. Thank you Wangard!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Johnson

customer_reviews.title: it works fine.
customer_reviews.text: WARNING! Do not buy two of these for the same household; they all work on the same frequency and there is no coding, so each remote controls all cars. Otherwise, it works fine.
customer_reviews.author: elikosh

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a young boy!!  Great quality, fast car.
customer_reviews.text: Runs surprisingly well, especially for the price! Fast, easy to use, sturdy. Our 4 year old was thrilled to get this race car and to be able to maneuver it himself. I would rebuy it if ours ever breaks.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany May

customer_reviews.title: Cool Looking Junk
customer_reviews.text: It looks cool and my son loved it, until 20 minutes after we put the batteries in and it's already having problems going. We can't figure out if it eats up battery life that fast or if it's something else, but either way it should not be happening this soon.
customer_reviews.author: emory2001

customer_reviews.title: FWI: there is not horn n remote
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 12 year old grandson and he loves it! Works great outside on cement and inside on hard floors/low pile carpet. One reviewer said his child likes the horn but there is no horn button on this. Lights are super and it drifts very realistically. Awesome detail!
customer_reviews.author: Floydene Lesher

customer_reviews.title: Decent car
customer_reviews.text: Bought this car for my daughter because it’s her dream car. Looks great but the range on the controller isn’t that great. You have to stay pretty close to it for it to work. Also, it has moved on its own a few times and the batteries were fine. It’s freaked us all out. Just a heads up... it may move on it’s own.
customer_reviews.author: Desiree Larmon

customer_reviews.title: Looks flashy
customer_reviews.text: This is a great gift for Christmas. The child who receives this will be quite happy. It looks bright and exciting and moves just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mary E.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for a boy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew’s 7th birthday and he absolutely loves it. I purchased it when it was on promotion so was very affordable - perfect gift for a boy!
customer_reviews.author: Jozzu

customer_reviews.title: This thing is so fun
customer_reviews.text: So I totally thought this thing would suck. But it really exceeded my expectations now it's not as cool as a gas-powered RC car but for something this size it's a lot of fun. I've even gotten it to drift.
customer_reviews.author: Squishmaster

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This is the coolest RC car my kids have ever had. It is easy to use, fast, even has headlights and taillights. It was a huge hit.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer J.

customer_reviews.title: does not come with batteries
customer_reviews.text: I sent two to my friend and they were the same band even the one I bought had the same band. cant race them
customer_reviews.author: Steven Keogh

customer_reviews.title: good gift for little boys
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my grandson's birthday - age 6. He loved it! A big hit. Be aware that it requires 5 AA batteries. The head and tail lights work but the doors don't open.
customer_reviews.author: Garden Level

customer_reviews.title: Fast and good.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast and excellent car for the price. Speed is amazing and frequency also good. The only reason I have one less star is because of the exterior material. The color comes off easily if it gets stuck under the sofa.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same reciever....
customer_reviews.text: So I'm a little disappointed the car was amazing. A little small but still nice and worked well(batteries not included). However I bought two of them and when our oldest came over a little later she unwrapped hers and the cars cannot be played with together. Hopefully I can get a different one so they can race.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great looking car and drives very fast with the lights ...
customer_reviews.text: Great looking car and drives very fast with the lights on in the front and the back. My 8 yr old is loving it and can't stop playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Myriam

customer_reviews.title: It has excellent design. Sufficient range between the car and the ...
customer_reviews.text: It has excellent design. Sufficient range between the car and the control for 27mhz. The battery lasts much longer than the 2.4ghz models. The control is well constructed and resistant. Surprising quality price. Perfect for interiors.
customer_reviews.author: EDID COLMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our 7 year old nephew's birthday. He LOVED it! His 5 year old brother also loved it. Car works great and even drives on carpet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonmom

customer_reviews.title: My son  loves it
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my son for christmas. He has played with it only a handful of times in doors and now it has completely stopped working. The back wheels are no longer functioning. The car will not move forward or reverse. Update: the company was very quick to respond to my review and sent a brand new car which is working great!
customer_reviews.author: heather vericella

customer_reviews.title: Great car
customer_reviews.text: Goes superfast. very durable. I really like how easy it is to control it. It has bright LED lights. it also works well on carpet. I cannot think of a bad review. it works well outside to. It comes with a screwdriver and that is very helpful. And if you're not touching anything and it's kind of turning to the left or the right there's a thing on the bottom that can help.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ability to contact the company!
customer_reviews.text: The remote broke in the first hour which was too bad. I gave this to my grandson for his birthday. At first we were really impressed with the car. I am having trouble connecting with the company for a replacement remote.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy Ricklic

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Worst purchase ever!! All my son asked for all year and finally found one just for it to NOT work. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Shelsie

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for many ages.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy ! One that can be recharged & adults as well as children like to operate it. Best little car & pretty durable as well.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loves this car!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my nephew and he loves this car! He plays for hours with it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my daughter, after one week, it broke down. Waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Esther N. Slade

customer_reviews.title: 6 year old approved.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old says it gets 5 stars because, "it is really fancy and it goes really fast". He also likes the headlights.
customer_reviews.author: Trying to do my best

customer_reviews.title: It worked for like five minutes
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because it didn't work, even after we tried mutliple sets of batteries. It worked for like five minutes, then didn't again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a dissapointment
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Christmas present for my 6year old stepson. It worked for one minute and then the wheels stopped spinning. What a disappointment. Seller got back to me right away and is sending me a new one. Lets hope this one works.
customer_reviews.author: Miss S M Longa

customer_reviews.title: Great little car
customer_reviews.text: Great little car, especially considering the price. The radio signal conflicts with my other sons car, and the range is not adjustable, but other than that, its a great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Armand

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 5 year old boy. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old boy. It's held up well through lots of crashes. I'd buy another.
customer_reviews.author: paul d stull

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: The car is Plastic but the mirrors are flimsy rubber. The Remote control isn't very good and it takes 5 AA Batteries
customer_reviews.author: jaylen

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality & Value, We did better in store
customer_reviews.text: This car looks very good. Details like the headlights are cool. Unfortunately the quality is lacking. Out of the box it is uncontrollable, right wheel is disconnected, wobbles back and forth no matter the adjustment. I'm sure we got a lemon, but even if this worked well, the value isn't there. For $10 more at our local big-box store we got a two pack that included a Lambo and a Police Car, both of which were way better in quality than this. If you do purchase this, save the box. Otherwise, try your local WalMart, Meijer, KMart...
customer_reviews.author: E. Hansen

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one use!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's birthday, and he loved it. That is, until it broke after one use! Will be looking for another remote control car. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tsedale Katherine Tomlinson

customer_reviews.title: Kept looking on amazon for a cheap remote control car ...
customer_reviews.text: Kept looking on amazon for a cheap remote control car for my son. Found this and it exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works very good but its just go and hit the walls and Goes under Furniture.......but durable
customer_reviews.author: dheeraj chanda

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after a couple times
customer_reviews.text: Worked briefly, then stopped. Replaced all batteries - still doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looks put stopped working after three days
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like the perfect right car for my kid. When I bought it it was working like the best rc car ever. Three days later the car stopped moving.everything else would work the back tires would not work.i have the review two stars because I really like the game car itself.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: again for grandson and he really enjoyed it..raced it with his father..
customer_reviews.author: Babi

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed and unhappy customer!
customer_reviews.text: If buying one of these items, there would have been no problem... HOWEVER...I purchased three for a set of brothers and they all ran on the same frequency. You can imagine the chaos this created on Christmas when they opened their gifts and began playing. It was DISASTEROUS!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great car. Even runs well on carpet. Have bought 2 for different grandkids, 5 year-olds, worked for both.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is such a fast and easy to control car. It is sooo pretty
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: It's real cool! When my daughter first saw it
customer_reviews.text: It's real cool! When my daughter first saw it, she is so happy! She told me:mommy, I got my own car too!😅
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: Awesome car at this price point! Zippy speeds, real lights, and quality build!
customer_reviews.author: hm86

customer_reviews.title: Lights really work very brightly, great bang fir buck....!
customer_reviews.text: Worked effortlessly and was great color and lights actually work,both front & back ones....!
customer_reviews.author: jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Fast Little RC car
customer_reviews.text: Car was a gift for my grandson who loved it and plays with it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Fondren

customer_reviews.title: Not only does it look great, but it is a fast little rc car
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this car. Not only does it look great, but it is a fast little rc car.
customer_reviews.author: mom2three

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little Lamborghini
customer_reviews.text: This little R/C Lamborghini is really cool. Headlights and taillights really work. Goes pretty fast and you can adjust the steering if it goes more to the left or right. Very cool looking and fun to play with.
customer_reviews.author: michael

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Small but fast! My son loves it and plays with it daily. I think the fact that it has working lights is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within the hour!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephew who is 3 for Christmas. He only had it in my home Christmas day and it stopped working. Not worth any amount of money.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Cool but..
customer_reviews.text: Cool toy .. awesome detail... but not meant to be played with 🤷🏻‍♀️ First one was defective. Was replaced right away, only lasted an hour...
customer_reviews.author: California mom

customer_reviews.title: They toy was at least 2x smaller than I expected ...
customer_reviews.text: They toy was at least 2x smaller than I expected. I should have looked at the dimensions. Still haven’t used it since it is a Christmas gift for my little brother.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy Granados

customer_reviews.title: Easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I love the way the looks and moves my son absolutely loves this car
customer_reviews.author: jose

customer_reviews.title: Nice design but axel broke within the second day of using...
customer_reviews.text: Car looks like on the pictures. Drives really well. Only problem is, that some parts a really poorly designed (axes) and therefore will break sooner or later. So I would definately not recommend buying this car for your children.
customer_reviews.author: dennis jost

customer_reviews.title: All show no go!
customer_reviews.text: Car looks good has good curb appeal, however it stopped moving after a couple of days. The motor was running but the car did not move.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my 5 year old nephew and he is loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Rik

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved that the tail lights come on when it reverses! Perfect for indoor play.
customer_reviews.author: Lety

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and fun RC car! Even for an adult!
customer_reviews.text: This RC car is so cool looking! 6 screws and 5 AA batteries later, I can finally test drive it! The controller was easy to use, but it’s not pressure controlled. The car itself is very quick! I can do power slides and everything! I like how the car itself doesn’t have an antenna wire sticking out of it, but this also made line of sight important. Also, because the controller is not pressure sensitive, it’s all go or nothing. It’ll take getting used to, but it’s very fun! Update: after putting in fresh ultra batteries, I don’t have the same antenna range issue. My son loves the car! Updated rating from 4 to 5 stars
customer_reviews.author: dantran99

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking car. Runs well but uses too many batteries. 5 total. Better if it is rechargable.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Got this for my son. He loves it! ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son. He loves it! He says it's super-fast and turns very well! Make sure to get 5 rechargeable AA batteries and charge it full before using.
customer_reviews.author: RT Raja

customer_reviews.title: Controller Malfunctions
customer_reviews.text: The product does not work properly. The forward and reverse work on the controller, however the right steering function causes the car to go in reverse. So the car can only go left as right is reverse.
customer_reviews.author: jenny anderson

customer_reviews.title: good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Heard he liked it. I thought it looked pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Got my son one for Christmas and it stopped working right away, got a replacement and it did the same thing right away. Very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Jeff K.

customer_reviews.title: he looks them up and watches videos so we got him a Lamborghini lol he loved it! The remote is easy to control and ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old told us he wants a Lamborghini, he looks them up and watches videos so we got him a Lamborghini lol he loved it! The remote is easy to control and the car responds well. A great gift for kids who like sports cars
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Getzler

customer_reviews.title: Nope!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the first one for my son for Christmas. It broke in 2 hours. Amazon replaced it within 2 days and that one broke within in an hour. So needless to say , I don’t recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very detailed
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoy playing with this car. Fast shipping and great seller.
customer_reviews.author: Nature Freek

customer_reviews.title: Ordered as a Christmas gift, so we haven't played ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered as a Christmas gift, so we haven't played with it yet, but I ordered the orange car and when it comes in it is not the bright orange in the picture, it is a red orange.
customer_reviews.author: Kylie Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase two cars from this vendor
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two different colored cars the remote controllers had same chip so my grandson's could race due to one remote control powering both cars
customer_reviews.author: Lisa B

customer_reviews.title: what a disappointment. I was not expecting a lot but this ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap item, what a disappointment. I was not expecting a lot but this item was not a good pirchase.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: A prize
customer_reviews.text: Bought for a prize for our Buddy Bash. Our way of saying thank you to typical teens who are buddies to our special needs kids all year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a 4 year old and he loved it. Fast shipping
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: One Star

product_meta.title: QUN FENG Electric RC Car-Lamborghini Veneno Radio Remote Control Vehicle Sport Racing Hobby Grade Licensed Model Car 1:24 Scale for Kids Adults (Red)
feature_bullets: ★Headlights glow with forward motion. Red tail lights when car backs up.

★Set includes a screw driver for easy assembly.Full function of forward/in reverse/ left/right and stop.Frequencies of the controller: 27 mhz(please kindly note that cars with same frequency can control Each other)
★1/24 scale size Approximate Dimensions: 19.9x8x4. 5cm. Officially licensed Lamborghini car.For ages 8 and up.
★ Wheels are made of high quality rubber, Lamborghini car requires 3AA batteries and 2AA batteries for the controller (not included). Easy to use rechargeable battery

★810mph speed, remote distance 30-40m.Test certificate: EN71, EN62115, RoHS, rtte. Please feel free to Contact us if you have any problem about our product, or if you found our any defective or damages on the RC car, We will pleased to sort out the problems.
